00019 #ifndef _FFT_RESULT_SPECTRUM_POWER_IN_INTERVAL_HPP_cm101026_
00020 #define _FFT_RESULT_SPECTRUM_POWER_IN_INTERVAL_HPP_cm101026_
00021 
00022 #include <string>
00023 #include <boost/lexical_cast.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time_io.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/filesystem.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/filesystem/fstream.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/format.hpp>
00029 
00030 #include "Spectrum.hpp"
00031 #include "FFTProcessor/Proxy.hpp"
00032 #include "FFTProcessor/Result.hpp"
00033 #include "FFTProcessor/Result/Calibration.hpp"
00034 
00035 namespace Result {
00036   class SpectrumPowerInInterval : public Base {
00037   public:
00038     typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumPowerInInterval> sptr;
00039     typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumPowerInInterval> Handle;
00040     typedef frequency_vector<double> PowerSpectrum;
00041 
00042     SpectrumPowerInInterval(ptime time,
00043                             double fReference, 
00044                             double bandwidth,
00045                             double normWindow)
00046       : Base("SpectrumPowerInInterval", time)
00047       , fReference_(fReference) 
00048       , bandwidth_(bandwidth)
00049       , normWindow_(normWindow)
00050       , strength_(0.) 
00051       , averageStrength_(0.) 
00052       , strengthRMS_(1.) {}
00053 
00054     virtual ~SpectrumPowerInInterval() {}
00055 
00056     bool proc(const Proxy::Base& p, const PowerSpectrum& ps) { 
00057       try {
00058         const std::pair<double, double> fMin(cal(fReference() - 0.75*bandwidth()));
00059         const std::pair<double, double> fMax(cal(fReference() + 0.75*bandwidth()));
00060         const size_t indexBeg(ps.freq2index(fMin.first));
00061         const size_t indexEnd(ps.freq2index(fMax.first));
00062 
00063         double sum(0), sum2(0);
00064         size_t counter(0);
00065         for (size_t u(indexBeg); u<=indexEnd; ++u, ++counter) {
00066           sum += ps[u].second;
00067           sum2 += ps[u].second * ps[u].second;
00068         }
00069         strength_        = p.volt2dbm(sum / normWindow()); // here we do _not_ correct for window gain
00070         averageStrength_ = p.volt2dbm((counter != 0) ? sum/counter : 1.);
00071         strengthRMS_     = p.rms_dbm() - 20.*std::log10(std::sqrt((counter != 0) ? counter : 1));
00072         // p.volt2dbm((counter != 0) ? std::sqrt(sum2/counter-averageStrength_*averageStrength_) : 1.);
00073         return true;
00074       } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00075         LOG_WARNING(e.what());
00076         return false;
00077       }
00078     }
00079 
00080     virtual std::string toString() const { 
00081       std::stringstream ss; 
00082       ss << Base::toString() 
00083          << " fReference="      << fReference()
00084          << " strength="        << strength()
00085          << " averageStrength=" << averageStrength()
00086          << " strengthRMS="     << strengthRMS()
00087          << " bandwidth="       << bandwidth();
00088       return ss.str();
00089     }
00090     double fReference() const { return fReference_; }
00091     double bandwidth() const { return bandwidth_; }
00092     double normWindow() const { return normWindow_; }
00093     double strength() const { return strength_; }
00094     double averageStrength() const { return averageStrength_; }
00095     double strengthRMS() const { return strengthRMS_; }
00096 
00097     // this method is overwritten e.g. in CalibratedSpectrumPeak
00098     virtual std::pair<double, double> cal(double f) const {
00099       return std::make_pair(f, double(1));
00100     }
00101 
00102     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const {      
00103       os << "# Frequency = " << boost::format("%12.3f") % fReference() << " [Hz]\n"
00104          << "# Bandwidth = " << boost::format("%9.3f")  % bandwidth()  << " [Hz]\n";
00105       Base::dump_header(os);
00106       return os << "strength_dBm averageStrength_dBm strengthRMS_dBm ";
00107     }
00108     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os) const {
00109       return os
00110         << boost::format("%7.2f")  % strength()        << " "
00111         << boost::format("%7.2f")  % averageStrength() << " "
00112         << boost::format("%7.2f")  % strengthRMS()     << " ";
00113     }
00114 
00115   private:
00116     double fReference_;
00117     double bandwidth_;
00118     double normWindow_;
00119     double strength_;
00120     double averageStrength_;
00121     double strengthRMS_;
00122   } ;
00123 
00124   class CalibratedSpectrumPowerInInterval : public SpectrumPowerInInterval {
00125   public:
00126     typedef boost::shared_ptr<SpectrumPeak> Handle;
00127     CalibratedSpectrumPowerInInterval(ptime time,
00128                                       double fReference,
00129                                       double bandwidth,
00130                                       double normWindow,
00131                                       Calibration::Handle calibrationHandle)
00132       : SpectrumPowerInInterval(time, fReference, bandwidth, normWindow)
00133       , calibrationHandle_(calibrationHandle) {
00134       processor::result_base::set_name("CalibratedSpectrumPowerInInterval");
00135     }
00136     virtual ~CalibratedSpectrumPowerInInterval() {}
00137 
00138     virtual std::pair<double, double> cal(double f) const {
00139       return calibrationHandle_->uncal2cal(f);
00140     }
00141 
00142   private:
00143     Calibration::Handle calibrationHandle_;
00144   } ;
00145 } // namespace Result
